attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban unisex changing rooms in places where children are such as swimming and sports centres and to bring back the seperate male and female changing rooms.
After my ten year old daughter and her friends were violated as they were getting changed together in a unisex changing room a man put his mobile phone over the top of the door and took photos of them getting changed.
This is not a one off as the sports centre said that it had happened a week before.
